activity_differential: camera operator walking along sidewalk and street
camera panning and moving through urban area
description: A camera moves along a sidewalk and street in an urban outdoor environment, capturing various static objects such as cars, manhole covers, stones, and a toy on the ground. A person is briefly visible walking across the street. The camera's movement is the main source of temporal change, as it pans and moves forward through the scene.
